channel.title: Probebly a common client error. please help!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i601.photobucket.com/albums/tt99/numbascape/alskdjfalskdfjlaskdfj.jpg[/img]
i really need help!!!
im trying to run a client
and this is whats in my EGUI file
[IMG]http://i601.photobucket.com/albums/tt99/numbascape/lkjh.jpg[/img]

item.title: Probebly a common client error. please help!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

primadude:

The error simply indicates that you don’t have a class file named EGUI in the directory the batch file is set to look in. Maybe try compiling?

or possibly he needs a dif write of .bat program… i love it when nobody EVER thinks of that… cause compiling NEVER fixes that stupid error… i had to write my own .bat runer for rsmv just to get it to work…

Read full topic
item.source: Probebly a common client error. please help!
